conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully uses an isometric cutaway perspective with visible wall geometry and interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and projection. Minor loss of point for some simplified wall corner intersections in the rear section.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful to the plan. Living area, dining, and main bedrooms match placement. Slight simplification of the servant room/utility area geometry at the front left.

interior_elements.notes: Most furniture is correctly translated from the 2D plan, including the specific sofa arrangement and dining set. Scale is well-maintained.

visual_clarity.notes: Consistent lighting and materials. Excellent legibility of spaces without text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Some balcony railings are rendered as solid walls rather than open balustrades.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that preserves spatial relationships and furniture layouts from the source plan.
